component.name: Meine Ausweiskopie
component.summary: Create redacted copies of German identity documents

description.p: Easily watermark and hide information in copies of your (German) identity documents!
This tool allows watermarking copies of German identity documents. You can also blacken information your recipient does not need (like the document number or CAN).
Currently, this tool supports the German identity card (Personalausweis), even temporary ones, and German passports.
